name: Hoppscotch
summary: Open source API development ecosystem with beautiful UI for testing REST, GraphQL, WebSocket, and more
why: Hoppscotch provides a lightweight, fast, and privacy-focused alternative to traditional API clients. Works offline, supports real-time collaboration, and offers a cleaner interface than competitors.
getting_started: Visit hoppscotch.io to use the web app instantly, or run locally with `npx @hoppscotch/cli serve` for offline usage. Import collections from Postman or start testing APIs immediately.
